node.title: Ho ho ho turns to no no no as Queensland restrictions slay Santa bookings
node.alt: A shopping centre Santa sits alone on his grand red throne.
node.description: A Santa hire business has copped a near 80 per cent drop in bookings as Queensland's COVID restrictions cast a pall over the holiday season.
node.content:
["Santas could be out of a job\u00a0as Queensland border rules and coronavirus restrictions dampen holiday\u00a0spirit across the state.", "The\u00a0border is set to open\u00a0a week before Christmas, but Santa impersonators are due to start work as early as next week.", "Ros Palici, who runs a Santa hire business, says she has only locked in nine bookings around the state as opposed to the usual 40 or more, with shopping centres \"playing it day by day\".", "\"Everyone's iffy because they're very scared of the border being closed, going into lockdown again, so people are very hesitant to confirm bookings,\" she said.", "Ms Palici said some Santas\u00a0coming from northern New South Wales would\u00a0be allowed to cross for work, but she was afraid their sleighs could become caught in painful and growing border traffic.", "\"A couple of the fellows live in the Mullumbimby area, so because they're going to work they will be exempt to go to Queensland,\" she said.", "\"As time goes on with the border check, it is going to take longer for them to travel \u2014 that will cost you money.", "", "
Santas will need to show proof of vaccination to pass through police checkpoints.(ABC News: Chris Gillette)
", "
In the red
", "Ms Palici said Santas had\u00a0been receiving their own gifts, but she was afraid they would be received like lumps of coal.", "\"I'm sending clothes up for the men to wear with the chance they might not be worn, so that's an expense for my business,\" she said.", "\"All that freight \u2014 the men may not even get a chance to wear the suit.\"", "Ongoing COVID rules mean Santas will have to\u00a0wear masks underneath their beards.", "\"They have to be 1.5 meters away from anybody, so you can't have a Santa roaming through smaller centres,\" Ms Palici\u00a0said.", "", "
Santas will need to maintain a distance of 1.5m while they're on the job, which Ms Palici says will rob kids of the chance to tell them their secrets.(ABC News: Kevin Nguyen)
", "
'Very sad'
", "Ms Palici is worried the rules will ruin the excitement of the season for kids.", "\"Santa is an icon to young children,\" she said.", "\"Children love Santa, they tell Santa their biggest secrets and they're not going to be able to do that, because they're not going to be able to get close enough to him to speak.", "She said until there was more certainty around what was\u00a0happening with the Queensland border, the Santas would be in limbo.", "\"Annastacia [Palaszczuk] is being very, very mean, very mean,\" she said.", "\"It's taking the joy of Christmas \u2014 the Santas are very sad because they want to give the children the experience.", "\"They're\u00a0still going to do the work, they want to be a Santa, but they're very sad they wont be giving or sharing the experience that the children expect.\""]
